statements: DELETE FROM communications WHERE donor_id = 101 AND communication_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM donors WHERE donor_category = 'Corporate' AND donation_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM communication WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND communication_date < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY);
DELETE FROM communications WHERE donor_id = 456 AND campaign_id = 789;
DELETE FROM communications WHERE donor_id = 5 AND campaign_id = 3 AND communication_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000 AND donation_date < '2022-01-01';
